summary: King of the Highlands: A Crown4Kings Series, a massive project greater than DLC proportion, adding 100+ hours of fully voiced quests, dungeons, and more. Developed and published by Crown4Kings Entertainment, based on Webb Family Publishing's King of the Highlands book. While WFP and King of the Highlands are brands of Vincent Webb Enterprises,
descriptionHtml:
[center]WARNING: Crown4Kings Entertainment does not and will not support translations or unofficial uploads of King of the Highlands. If you are playing a translation or unlisted download of this project, we cannot, do not, and will not guarantee that your version of King of the Highlands has not been altered or that it is up-to-date.[/center]

[center][size=6]KING OF THE HIGHLANDS[/size][/center][center]By Crown4Kings Entertainment

For over six hundred years the Highlands was ruled by tyrants from the Kingdom of Drake.

But now, with the assassination of the King, a war commences for the Crown in Eagle's Nest.

[b]WHAT IS KING OF THE HIGHLANDS?[/b]
[/center]King of the Highlands is a game created within a game based on a book, adding an entirely new worldspace to The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. Included in the game is a large new land, places, people, quests, dungeons and more for the player to experience. It adds roughly 100+ hours of content, and favours all types of characters where the player can either choose to fight alongside the leaders of the Four Kingdoms or Ironhand Pact.
author: Crown4Kings Entertainment
